DOC.brief_summary: This study is not being conducted in the United States. Vildagliptin is an oral antidiabetic agent. This 52-week clinical study is designed as an open label, long-term study aimed to evaluate the safety of vildagliptin in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Study of Vildagliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes Patients who have been placed on diet and exercise therapy without achieving target blood glucose levels Outpatients Type 1 diabetes, diabetes that is a result of pancreatic injury, or secondary forms of diabetes Significant cardiovascular complications as defined by the protocol Significant diabetic complications as defined by the protocol Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
